na mma ɔmmema noho do wɔ ne dadzetar no mu: na mma hom nngyaa ne mberantsɛ no; hom nsɛɛ no dɔm nyinara huntuhuntu."

column2: "Na wɔbɔtotɔ ahwehwe ase wɔ Kaldeafo asaase do

column3: na nyimpa biara ngye noho nkwa; mma wonntwa hom nkyen wɔ n’emumuyɛ mu; na EWURADZE n’awerdziber nye no; obotua no n’ahyɛnanmu kaw no."

column2: "Nna Babilɔn yɛ sika kɔɔpow wɔ EWURADZE nsamu a ɔmaa asaase nyinara bowee: amanaman anom ne nsa bi; dɛm ntsi na amanaman abobɔ adam."
"Babilɔn ahwe ase awerɛfir mu asɛɛ: hom ntwa ewuo mma no; hom mfa ne yaw n’ano edur mbra
column3: bi a wɔsa no yarba a ɔbɛyɛ yie."
naaso annsa. Hom ndan no ngya
column4: na hom mma hɛn mu biara nkɔ nankasa no kurow mu: osiandɛ n’atsɛmbu edu ɔsor
column5: na wɔama do ekodu wimu wimu mpo."

column2: "EWURADZE eyi hɛn tsenenee edzi: hom mbra
column3: ma yɛnkɛka EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn n’edwuma nkyerɛ wɔ Zion."

column2: "Hom nsew egyen menaba no ano; hom nsuo akokyɛm no mu dzen: EWURADZE ekenyan Media ahemfo hɔn sunsum; osiandɛ wɔabɔ Babilɔn ho tsirmpɔw dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ no: na EWURADZE n’awerdzi
column3: n’asɔrfi ho awerdzi nye no."
hom mma aweɔn mu nyɛ dzen

column3: ɔno na ɔdze ne nyansaa etsintsim wiadze

column3: esu no weɔɔyɛ ba ɔsorsor

column5: na ɔdze mframa fi n’adzekorabea ba."

column2: "Nyimpa biara abɛyɛ dɛ abowa na onnyim dze; osikadwinnyi biara ne sianhonyi hyɛ no enyito: na no guhonyi yɛ ator

ndaadaa dwuma a: hɔn asotweber mu wɔbɛhera."

column2: "Jakob ne kyɛfa nntse dɛ iyinom; na ɔno nye adze nyinara ne yɛfo; na Israel nye n’egyapadze ebusuakuw; dɔm EWURADZE nye ne dzin."
"Ɔwo nye m’ekuma na m’akondadze; ɔwo na medze mubobubu amanaman mu esinesin; na medze ɔwo mebɛsɛɛ ahendzi;"
"na medze ɔwo mubobubu pɔnkɔ na nyia ɔtse no do no mu esinesin;"

"na medze ɔwo mubobubu tseaseanam na nyia ɔtse mu no mu esinesin; na medze ɔwo mubobubu ɔbanyin na ɔbaa mu esinesin; na medze ɔwo mubobubu akɔdaa na abofra mu esinesin; na medze ɔwo mubobubu aberantsɛ na ababaawa no mu esinesin;"
"na medze ɔwo mubobubu oguanhwɛfo na no nguankuw no mu esinesin; na medze ɔwo mubobubu ɔnantwi na ne mpamho no mu esinesin; na medze ɔwo mubobubu ambradofo na amampanyin no mu esinesin."
"Na mubotua Babilɔn na Kaldeafo no nyinara kaw wɔ hɔn mbusu a wɔabɔ no hom enyim wɔ Zion no nyinara ho
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Asɛm a nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia dze hyɛɛ Maseia ba Neria ne ba Seraia
column3: ber a ɔnye Judahen Zedekia kɔr Babilɔn wɔ n’ahendzi afe a otsia anan no mu nye yi. Afei na Seraia yɛ gyaasehen."

column2: "Na Jeremia kyerɛɛw mbusu a ɔbɛba Babilɔn do nyina hyɛɛ nwoma mu
column3: mekyerɛ nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Babilɔn ho yi nyina."
